title: How to Buy PlayStation Network Credits

steps.headline: Go to the PlayStation online store on your Internet browser using the following method.
steps.description: Visit the PlayStation website homepage. Browse over "PlayStation Network" on the left menu bar. Select "PlayStation Store" from the pop-up menu.

steps.headline: Press the "Sign In" button and log in using your PlayStation network username and password.
steps.description: If you don't have a network account you will have to create one by pressing the "Join Now" button and filling in the registration form. You can then return to the main store page to log in.

steps.headline: Click on your username at the top of the account page after you have signed in and select "Account Settings" from the drop-down menu.
Change your account settings by clicking on "Manage Account."
Look for the "Add Funds" link under the "Transaction Management" heading.
steps.description: Click on this link to add funds.

steps.headline: Fill the appropriate fields with the numbers at the front of the credit or debit card that you want to use to buy PlayStation network credits.
Enter the amount of money that you want to transfer from your credit or debit card to your account as PlayStation credits.
Finalize the transaction by clicking on "Continue" at the bottom of the page.
steps.description: If there are sufficient funds in your credit or debit card the amount that you had chosen will be added immediately to your PlayStation account.

text: Go to the PlayStation online store on your Internet browser using the following method. Visit the PlayStation website homepage. Browse over "PlayStation Network" on the left menu bar. Select "PlayStation Store" from the pop-up menu. Press the "Sign In" button and log in using your PlayStation network username and password. If you don't have a network account you will have to create one by pressing the "Join Now" button and filling in the registration form. You can then return to the main store page to log in. Click on your username at the top of the account page after you have signed in and select "Account Settings" from the drop-down menu.  Change your account settings by clicking on "Manage Account."  Look for the "Add Funds" link under the "Transaction Management" heading. Click on this link to add funds. Fill the appropriate fields with the numbers at the front of the credit or debit card that you want to use to buy PlayStation network credits.  Enter the amount of money that you want to transfer from your credit or debit card to your account as PlayStation credits.  Finalize the transaction by clicking on "Continue" at the bottom of the page. If there are sufficient funds in your credit or debit card the amount that you had chosen will be added immediately to your PlayStation account.
